comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: Baron Adolf de Meyer (1868-1949) was a French photographer, and a pioneer of fashion photography. Here is one of his photographs from 1920. He married the former Olga Caracciolo (1871-1930) in 1899. Here is a 1907 drawing of the Baroness by American artist John Singer Sargent. Searching for either of them on the Internet yields an abundance of links. The Baronial title appears to have been bogus, though Mrs. de Meyer was the daughter of an Italian Duke.
